category: Athletes’ Committee Regulations/Article 5 (Duties of Committee Members)
contents: Article 5 (Duties of members) ① The chairperson represents the committee and supervises its work. ② The vice chairperson assists the chairperson, and if the chairperson is unable to perform his/her duties due to unavoidable reasons, the vice chairpersons shall perform the duties in order of seniority. ③ Members form a committee, attend the committee, and decide on matters related to their duties.
